00026 // Triangular Matrices (Views and Adpators)
00027 
00028 #ifndef TRIANG_H
00029 #define TRIANG_H
00030 
00031 // default to use lower-triangular portions of arrays
00032 // for symmetric matrices.
00033 
00034 namespace TNT
00035 {
00036 
00037 template <class MaTRiX>
00038 class LowerTriangularView
00039 {
00040     protected:
00041 
00042 
00043         const MaTRiX  &A_;
00044         const typename MaTRiX::element_type zero_;
00045 
00046     public:
00047 
00048 
00049     typedef typename MaTRiX::const_reference const_reference;
00050     typedef const typename MaTRiX::element_type element_type;
00051     typedef const typename MaTRiX::element_type value_type;
00052     typedef element_type T;
00053 
00054     Subscript dim(Subscript d) const {  return A_.dim(d); }
00055     Subscript lbound() const { return A_.lbound(); }
00056     Subscript num_rows() const { return A_.num_rows(); }
00057     Subscript num_cols() const { return A_.num_cols(); }
00058     
00059     
00060     // constructors
00061 
00062     LowerTriangularView(/*const*/ MaTRiX &A) : A_(A),  zero_(0) {}
00063 
00064 
00065     inline const_reference get(Subscript i, Subscript j) const
00066     { 
00067 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00068         assert(lbound()<=i);
00069         assert(i<=A_.num_rows() + lbound() - 1);
00070         assert(lbound()<=j);
00071         assert(j<=A_.num_cols() + lbound() - 1);
00072 #endif
00073         if (i<j) 
00074             return zero_;
00075         else
00076             return A_(i,j);
00077     }
00078 
00079 
00080     inline const_reference operator() (Subscript i, Subscript j) const
00081     {
00082 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00083         assert(lbound()<=i);
00084         assert(i<=A_.num_rows() + lbound() - 1);
00085         assert(lbound()<=j);
00086         assert(j<=A_.num_cols() + lbound() - 1);
00087 #endif
00088         if (i<j) 
00089             return zero_;
00090         else
00091             return A_(i,j);
00092     }
00093 
00094 #ifdef TNT_USE_REGIONS 
00095 
00096     typedef const_Region2D< LowerTriangularView<MaTRiX> > 
00097                     const_Region;
00098 
00099     const_Region operator()(/*const*/ Index1D &I,
00100             /*const*/ Index1D &J) const
00101     {
00102         return const_Region(*this, I, J);
00103     }
00104 
00105     const_Region operator()(Subscript i1, Subscript i2,
00106             Subscript j1, Subscript j2) const
00107     {
00108         return const_Region(*this, i1, i2, j1, j2);
00109     }
00110 
00111 
00112 
00113 #endif
00114 // TNT_USE_REGIONS
00115 
00116 };
00117 
00118 
00119 /* *********** Lower_triangular_view() algorithms ****************** */
00120 
00121 template <class MaTRiX, class VecToR>
00122 VecToR matmult(/*const*/ LowerTriangularView<MaTRiX> &A, VecToR &x)
00123 {
00124     Subscript M = A.num_rows();
00125     Subscript N = A.num_cols();
00126 
00127     assert(N == x.dim());
00128 
00129     Subscript i, j;
00130     typename MaTRiX::element_type sum=0.0;
00131     VecToR result(M);
00132 
00133     Subscript start = A.lbound();
00134     Subscript Mend = M + A.lbound() -1 ;
00135 
00136     for (i=start; i<=Mend; i++)
00137     {
00138         sum = 0.0;
00139         for (j=start; j<=i; j++)
00140             sum = sum + A(i,j)*x(j);
00141         result(i) = sum;
00142     }
00143 
00144     return result;
00145 }
00146 
00147 template <class MaTRiX, class VecToR>
00148 inline VecToR operator*(/*const*/ LowerTriangularView<MaTRiX> &A, VecToR &x)
00149 {
00150     return matmult(A,x);
00151 }
00152 
00153 template <class MaTRiX>
00154 class UnitLowerTriangularView
00155 {
00156     protected:
00157 
00158         const MaTRiX  &A_;
00159         const typename MaTRiX::element_type zero;
00160         const typename MaTRiX::element_type one;
00161 
00162     public:
00163 
00164     typedef typename MaTRiX::const_reference const_reference;
00165     typedef typename MaTRiX::element_type element_type;
00166     typedef typename MaTRiX::element_type value_type;
00167     typedef element_type T;
00168 
00169     Subscript lbound() const { return 1; }
00170     Subscript dim(Subscript d) const {  return A_.dim(d); }
00171     Subscript num_rows() const { return A_.num_rows(); }
00172     Subscript num_cols() const { return A_.num_cols(); }
00173 
00174     
00175     // constructors
00176 
00177     UnitLowerTriangularView(/*const*/ MaTRiX &A) : A_(A), zero(0), one(1) {}
00178 
00179 
00180     inline const_reference get(Subscript i, Subscript j) const
00181     { 
00182 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00183         assert(1<=i);
00184         assert(i<=A_.dim(1));
00185         assert(1<=j);
00186         assert(j<=A_.dim(2));
00187         assert(0<=i && i<A_.dim(0) && 0<=j && j<A_.dim(1));
00188 #endif
00189         if (i>j)
00190             return A_(i,j);
00191         else if (i==j)
00192             return one;
00193         else 
00194             return zero;
00195     }
00196 
00197 
00198     inline const_reference operator() (Subscript i, Subscript j) const
00199     {
00200 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00201         assert(1<=i);
00202         assert(i<=A_.dim(1));
00203         assert(1<=j);
00204         assert(j<=A_.dim(2));
00205 #endif
00206         if (i>j)
00207             return A_(i,j);
00208         else if (i==j)
00209             return one;
00210         else 
00211             return zero;
00212     }
00213 
00214 
00215 #ifdef TNT_USE_REGIONS 
00216   // These are the "index-aware" features
00217 
00218     typedef const_Region2D< UnitLowerTriangularView<MaTRiX> > 
00219                     const_Region;
00220 
00221     const_Region operator()(/*const*/ Index1D &I,
00222             /*const*/ Index1D &J) const
00223     {
00224         return const_Region(*this, I, J);
00225     }
00226 
00227     const_Region operator()(Subscript i1, Subscript i2,
00228             Subscript j1, Subscript j2) const
00229     {
00230         return const_Region(*this, i1, i2, j1, j2);
00231     }
00232 #endif
00233 // TNT_USE_REGIONS
00234 };
00235 
00236 template <class MaTRiX>
00237 LowerTriangularView<MaTRiX> Lower_triangular_view(
00238     /*const*/ MaTRiX &A)
00239 {
00240     return LowerTriangularView<MaTRiX>(A);
00241 }

00244 template <class MaTRiX>
00245 UnitLowerTriangularView<MaTRiX> Unit_lower_triangular_view(
00246     /*const*/ MaTRiX &A)
00247 {
00248     return UnitLowerTriangularView<MaTRiX>(A);
00249 }
00250 
00251 template <class MaTRiX, class VecToR>
00252 VecToR matmult(/*const*/ UnitLowerTriangularView<MaTRiX> &A, VecToR &x)
00253 {
00254     Subscript M = A.num_rows();
00255     Subscript N = A.num_cols();
00256 
00257     assert(N == x.dim());
00258 
00259     Subscript i, j;
00260     typename MaTRiX::element_type sum=0.0;
00261     VecToR result(M);
00262 
00263     Subscript start = A.lbound();
00264     Subscript Mend = M + A.lbound() -1 ;
00265 
00266     for (i=start; i<=Mend; i++)
00267     {
00268         sum = 0.0;
00269         for (j=start; j<i; j++)
00270             sum = sum + A(i,j)*x(j);
00271         result(i) = sum + x(i);
00272     }
00273 
00274     return result;
00275 }
00276 
00277 template <class MaTRiX, class VecToR>
00278 inline VecToR operator*(/*const*/ UnitLowerTriangularView<MaTRiX> &A, VecToR &x)
00279 {
00280     return matmult(A,x);
00281 }

00288 template <class MaTRiX>
00289 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, const LowerTriangularView<MaTRiX>&A)
00290 {
00291     Subscript M=A.num_rows();
00292     Subscript N=A.num_cols();
00293 
00294     s << M << " " << N << endl;
00295 
00296     for (Subscript i=1; i<=M; i++)
00297     {
00298         for (Subscript j=1; j<=N; j++)
00299         {
00300             s << A(i,j) << " ";
00301         }
00302         s << endl;
00303     }
00304 
00305 
00306     return s;
00307 }

00335 template <class MaTRiX>
00336 class UpperTriangularView
00337 {
00338     protected:
00339 
00340 
00341         /*const*/ MaTRiX  &A_;
00342         /*const*/ typename MaTRiX::element_type zero_;
00343 
00344     public:
00345 
00346 
00347     typedef typename MaTRiX::const_reference const_reference;
00348     typedef /*const*/ typename MaTRiX::element_type element_type;
00349     typedef /*const*/ typename MaTRiX::element_type value_type;
00350     typedef element_type T;
00351 
00352     Subscript dim(Subscript d) const {  return A_.dim(d); }
00353     Subscript lbound() const { return A_.lbound(); }
00354     Subscript num_rows() const { return A_.num_rows(); }
00355     Subscript num_cols() const { return A_.num_cols(); }
00356     
00357     
00358     // constructors
00359 
00360     UpperTriangularView(/*const*/ MaTRiX &A) : A_(A),  zero_(0) {}
00361 
00362 
00363     inline const_reference get(Subscript i, Subscript j) const
00364     { 
00365 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00366         assert(lbound()<=i);
00367         assert(i<=A_.num_rows() + lbound() - 1);
00368         assert(lbound()<=j);
00369         assert(j<=A_.num_cols() + lbound() - 1);
00370 #endif
00371         if (i>j) 
00372             return zero_;
00373         else
00374             return A_(i,j);
00375     }
00376 
00377 
00378     inline const_reference operator() (Subscript i, Subscript j) const
00379     {
00380 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00381         assert(lbound()<=i);
00382         assert(i<=A_.num_rows() + lbound() - 1);
00383         assert(lbound()<=j);
00384         assert(j<=A_.num_cols() + lbound() - 1);
00385 #endif
00386         if (i>j) 
00387             return zero_;
00388         else
00389             return A_(i,j);
00390     }
00391 
00392 #ifdef TNT_USE_REGIONS 
00393 
00394     typedef const_Region2D< UpperTriangularView<MaTRiX> > 
00395                     const_Region;
00396 
00397     const_Region operator()(const Index1D &I,
00398             const Index1D &J) const
00399     {
00400         return const_Region(*this, I, J);
00401     }
00402 
00403     const_Region operator()(Subscript i1, Subscript i2,
00404             Subscript j1, Subscript j2) const
00405     {
00406         return const_Region(*this, i1, i2, j1, j2);
00407     }
00408 
00409 
00410 
00411 #endif
00412 // TNT_USE_REGIONS
00413 
00414 };

00417 /* *********** Upper_triangular_view() algorithms ****************** */
00418 
00419 template <class MaTRiX, class VecToR>
00420 VecToR matmult(/*const*/ UpperTriangularView<MaTRiX> &A, VecToR &x)
00421 {
00422     Subscript M = A.num_rows();
00423     Subscript N = A.num_cols();
00424 
00425     assert(N == x.dim());
00426 
00427     Subscript i, j;
00428     typename VecToR::element_type sum=0.0;
00429     VecToR result(M);
00430 
00431     Subscript start = A.lbound();
00432     Subscript Mend = M + A.lbound() -1 ;
00433 
00434     for (i=start; i<=Mend; i++)
00435     {
00436         sum = 0.0;
00437         for (j=i; j<=N; j++)
00438             sum = sum + A(i,j)*x(j);
00439         result(i) = sum;
00440     }
00441 
00442     return result;
00443 }
00444 
00445 template <class MaTRiX, class VecToR>
00446 inline VecToR operator*(/*const*/ UpperTriangularView<MaTRiX> &A, VecToR &x)
00447 {
00448     return matmult(A,x);
00449 }

00451 template <class MaTRiX>
00452 class UnitUpperTriangularView
00453 {
00454     protected:
00455 
00456         const MaTRiX  &A_;
00457         const typename MaTRiX::element_type zero;
00458         const typename MaTRiX::element_type one;
00459 
00460     public:
00461 
00462     typedef typename MaTRiX::const_reference const_reference;
00463     typedef typename MaTRiX::element_type element_type;
00464     typedef typename MaTRiX::element_type value_type;
00465     typedef element_type T;
00466 
00467     Subscript lbound() const { return 1; }
00468     Subscript dim(Subscript d) const {  return A_.dim(d); }
00469     Subscript num_rows() const { return A_.num_rows(); }
00470     Subscript num_cols() const { return A_.num_cols(); }
00471 
00472     
00473     // constructors
00474 
00475     UnitUpperTriangularView(/*const*/ MaTRiX &A) : A_(A), zero(0), one(1) {}
00476 
00477 
00478     inline const_reference get(Subscript i, Subscript j) const
00479     { 
00480 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00481         assert(1<=i);
00482         assert(i<=A_.dim(1));
00483         assert(1<=j);
00484         assert(j<=A_.dim(2));
00485         assert(0<=i && i<A_.dim(0) && 0<=j && j<A_.dim(1));
00486 #endif
00487         if (i<j)
00488             return A_(i,j);
00489         else if (i==j)
00490             return one;
00491         else 
00492             return zero;
00493     }
00494 
00495 
00496     inline const_reference operator() (Subscript i, Subscript j) const
00497     {
00498 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00499         assert(1<=i);
00500         assert(i<=A_.dim(1));
00501         assert(1<=j);
00502         assert(j<=A_.dim(2));
00503 #endif
00504         if (i<j)
00505             return A_(i,j);
00506         else if (i==j)
00507             return one;
00508         else 
00509             return zero;
00510     }
00511 
00512 
00513 #ifdef TNT_USE_REGIONS 
00514   // These are the "index-aware" features
00515 
00516     typedef const_Region2D< UnitUpperTriangularView<MaTRiX> > 
00517                     const_Region;
00518 
00519     const_Region operator()(const Index1D &I,
00520             const Index1D &J) const
00521     {
00522         return const_Region(*this, I, J);
00523     }
00524 
00525     const_Region operator()(Subscript i1, Subscript i2,
00526             Subscript j1, Subscript j2) const
00527     {
00528         return const_Region(*this, i1, i2, j1, j2);
00529     }
00530 #endif
00531 // TNT_USE_REGIONS
00532 };

00542 template <class MaTRiX>
00543 UnitUpperTriangularView<MaTRiX> Unit_upper_triangular_view(
00544     /*const*/ MaTRiX &A)

00548 
00549 template <class MaTRiX, class VecToR>
00550 VecToR matmult(/*const*/ UnitUpperTriangularView<MaTRiX> &A, VecToR &x)
00551 {
00552     Subscript M = A.num_rows();
00553     Subscript N = A.num_cols();
00554 
00555     assert(N == x.dim());
00556 
00557     Subscript i, j;
00558     typename VecToR::element_type sum=0.0;
00559     VecToR result(M);
00560 
00561     Subscript start = A.lbound();
00562     Subscript Mend = M + A.lbound() -1 ;
00563 
00564     for (i=start; i<=Mend; i++)
00565     {
00566         sum = x(i);
00567         for (j=i+1; j<=N; j++)
00568             sum = sum + A(i,j)*x(j);
00569         result(i) = sum + x(i);
00570     }
00571 
00572     return result;
00573 }
00574 
00575 template <class MaTRiX, class VecToR>
00576 inline VecToR operator*(/*const*/ UnitUpperTriangularView<MaTRiX> &A, VecToR &x)
00577 {
00578     return matmult(A,x);
00579 }

00586 template <class MaTRiX>
00587 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, 
00588     /*const*/ UpperTriangularView<MaTRiX>&A)
00589 {
00590     Subscript M=A.num_rows();
00591     Subscript N=A.num_cols();
00592 
00593     s << M << " " << N << endl;
00594 
00595     for (Subscript i=1; i<=M; i++)
00596     {
00597         for (Subscript j=1; j<=N; j++)
00598         {
00599             s << A(i,j) << " ";
00600         }
00601         s << endl;
00602     }
00603 
00604 
00605     return s;
00606 }
00607 
00608 template <class MaTRiX>
00609 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, 
00610         /*const*/ UnitUpperTriangularView<MaTRiX>&A)
00611 {
00612     Subscript M=A.num_rows();
00613     Subscript N=A.num_cols();
00614 
00615     s << M << " " << N << endl;
00616 
00617     for (Subscript i=1; i<=M; i++)
00618     {
00619         for (Subscript j=1; j<=N; j++)
00620         {
00621             s << A(i,j) << " ";
00622         }
00623         s << endl;
00624     }
00625 
00626 
00627     return s;
